name: Pegasus Door
description: As professor Finn, you must eliminate all the waves of ennemies send to get you back to the organisation you created but left in a rush. Protect your armory from damages with the weapons at your disposal, buy new ones and upgrade them with the money you collect from your frags.
minimum_requirements: OS: Seven and + Processor: i5 and + Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 1060 or ATI390 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space
